What is (are) Breast Cancer ?,"When cancer spreads from its original location in the breast to another part of the body such as the brain, it is called metastatic breast cancer, not brain cancer. Doctors sometimes call this ""distant"" disease.",NIHSeniorHealth,Breast Cancer
